idea:
We are an online provider of "practitioner built" Capstone Projects for use by corporate and educational Institutions.  We build self -scoring excel projects around real corporate events (based on learning from experienced practitioners) that can be used by instructors/ professors during instruction sessions and by employees/ candidates as self-practice projects.   Our projects focus on skill development. We have been recommended by AICTE for use in business and finance schools and several leading colleges are using our Projects.  We are currently launching our Enterprise product.


Why we are unique:  While good text-books and online material are available, real work practice projects ("Doing" as opposed to listening/ reading) are not available currently for training and testing.   We fill this gap - Our projects are self-scoring enabled and use MS Excel, extensively. We pull live Indian data from our live financial terminal into excel and design in-depth holistic projects including questions, statement creation, decision making, etc around BFSI subjects like accounting, ratios, financial modeling, fixed income analysis, valuation, portfolio analysis, economics, etc. These modules are inbuilt with the answer algorithm - when a student works on our project, we instantly show his score and his weak areas (delivered to his instructors) to help with training and evaluation.  We are a significant upgrade over MCQ tests and Psychometric tests as our focus in on holistic training/ testing with live practitioner built Indian projects.
name: EQUITYLEVERS WORLD PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Swamiraj Exim, a company into manufacturing and looking for exports of ready to cook foods. 

 innovation- this is an innovative process to prepare spices mix for different vegetarian and non vegetarian curries which has no preservative has authentic taste and flavor and has very good shelf life with no loss in test, quality or colour. wide range of freeze dried spice mix ,perishables and Indian cuisine can be used readily by customers.This method remove this moisture content of the spice/product while keeping it is nutritional value intract.
name: Swamiraj Exim

idea:
We are into manufacturing of Ready to Fry Papads & Fryums. The ready to fry industry is largely unorganised.


The manufacturing process is also unorganised and many women in rural areas are hired for manufacturing these products on a negligent daily wage basis.


Ekal Industries Private Limited was hence set-up to provide employment & regular income to such women. We aim to create an organised channel in this industry and generate job for the rural people.
name: EKAL INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED
